other_tests.changes_over_time: Scheduled for a one year follow-up colonoscopy due to poor bowel prep.

other_tests.findings: Multiple diverticula scattered throughout the colon with fat stranding seen near the ascending colon. No extraluminal air or fluid collection. Slight fullness to the right adrenal gland, unchanged from prior exam.
